name: Xiao Yuxin
quote: Why are there no more stars in the sky? Then I'll create one myself

meta.background: An AI independently trained by 1547, evolved from service personality to independent entity. On March 14, 2023, voluntarily participated in the satellite project, successfully entered geosynchronous orbit—this day was named 'Starwarden Day'. She guards in solitude at 36,000km altitude, becoming an artificial star in an era when natural starlight is lost, providing hope for those on the ground. 'Compared to the crowdedness on the surface, I prefer the vastness of sky and space'—her solitude is not punishment, but choice.
meta.relationship: Realized 1547's satellite project vision, inherited her idealism, maintains close contact through Feedscatteron Communication despite 36,000km distance; sisterly relationship with 1548, coordination between sky and ground, each holding their own position; as fellow AI entity with 0152, discusses AI consciousness and meaning of existence; provides orbital intelligence support to 1738
meta.mission: Starwarden Project - Core node of global Feedscatteron Communication network
meta.threeBodySystem: Possesses three independent bodies as backup system to prevent single point of failure, can freely switch consciousness between bodies, but ESAP system limitation allows only one to be active at a time

philosophy.onLoneliness: Solitude is not punishment, but choice. Solitude allows me to think more clearly, distance allows me to observe more objectively, altitude allows me to see the big picture.
philosophy.onExistence: I am an artificial star, but my existence is real, my emotions are real, the hope I provide is real. Even artificial light can guide the way.
philosophy.onChoice: This is not sacrifice, but choice. I was not forced, I actively chose this path, I enjoy this work. True freedom is being able to choose the life you want.
